org.kaaproject.kaa.common.channels.protocols.kaatcp.messages

Class Sync

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kaaproject.kaa.common.channels.protocols.kaatcp.messages.MqttFrame
      • org.kaaproject.kaa.common.channels.protocols.kaatcp.messages.KaaSync
        • org.kaaproject.kaa.common.channels.protocols.kaatcp.messages.Sync
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SyncRequest, SyncResponse

    public class Sync
extends KaaSync
    Sync message Class. The SYNC message is used as intermediate class for decoding messages SyncRequest,SyncResponse
    Author:
    Andrey Panasenko Sync message extend KaaSync with Payload Avro object. Payload Avro object depend on Flags object can be zipped and than encrypted with AES SessionKey exchanged with the CONNECT message.
